documentation.text:
@dev allows owner of lottery to set price of the ticket
 @param price new price of a ticket
@dev retrieves lottery deadline
@dev returns start block of current lottery if gameStarted

@dev calculate rest amount of eth to send back to users
 @param value amount the user will pay with

@dev allows winner of current lottery to withdraw payment
 @param payee address of recipient to whom amount will be sent

@dev get participants and blocknumbers
 @dev if empty function calls to contract

buyTicket().details: buy a lottery ticket with this function

calculateWinner().details: calculates the winner of the lottery

getWinner().details: returns the winner of the current lottery if there is one

params._deadline: time after lottery should be closed
params._maxTickets: maximum amount of tickets to be sold during this lottery
params._maxUserTickets: maximum amount of tickets a user can buy during this lottery
params._ticketPrice: price of the a ticket during the lottery

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

payments(address).details: Returns the payments owed to an address.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setPrice(uint256).details: allows owner of lottery to set price of the ticket

startBlock().details: returns start block of current lottery if gameStarted

ticketsOwned(address).details: returns the tickets owned by the caller of the function

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawPayments(address).details: allows winner of current lottery to withdraw payment

params.payee: address of recipient to whom amount will be sent

buyTicket().notice: lottery has to be active for people to be able to ticket

calculateWinner().notice: generates random number from random block number and random user addressincrements lotteries of a participantdeactivates current lotterystores total tickets bought during current lottery roundtransfers prize to escrow
